hooks.command:
echo "
⚠️  BEFORE COMPACTION - Pre-Push Chronicle Gate Review:

1. Chronicle-worthy? (new capability, decision, insight, pattern, Go/GraphQL lessons?)

   → If yes: Document appropriately

Do NOT proceed until you have reviewed ALL session work for worthy items.
See AGENTS.md Pre-Push Chronicle Gate section for the full checklist.
"

echo "
⚠️  PRE-PUSH CHRONICLE GATE

Review ALL commits being pushed:

□ Chronicle-worthy? (new capability, decision, insight, Go patterns, GraphQL design?)
  → If yes: Create diary entry in diary/ BEFORE pushing

□ Archive-worthy? (Linear API integration patterns, design decisions?)
  → If yes: Document BEFORE pushing

STOP and create entries before pushing if anything was missed.
"
